tool_description:
Amazon Product Reviews
Contact me at: vuesdata@gmail.com or visit https://www.vuesdata.com for building custom spiders or custom requests.
title: Amazon Product Reviews

api_list.name: AmazonProductReviews
api_list.description:
It will accept three parameters asin, domain, pageNum.
For Ex:
asin: B087N3LWRB  (you can find it in the product page of amazon)
domain: amazon.co.uk  (put the domain without www, currently we only provide amazon.com, amazon.in and amazon.co.uk)
pageNum: 1 (min 1 and max depends on the number of reviews on the product.  Each page give 10 reviews)

body.ProductName: BENGOO G9000 Stereo Gaming Headset for PS4 PC Xbox One PS5 Controller, Noise Cancelling Over Ear Headphones with Mic, LED Light, Bass Surround, Soft Memory Earmuffs for Laptop Mac Nintendo NES Games

Reviewers.review_body: I needed a cheap headset for my Xbox X Series until I got my good headset back, and this headset works in that regard. For the price ($25), this is a pretty good headset. The game sound is decent, and the fit on my head is pretty comfy. Some downsides I have seen are, I could barely hear my friends during game play. I've been messing with the audio settings, but I haven't figured it out yet. Maybe that is just the headset. I can hear them, but not at the volume I'd like. Also, the cord is ridiculously long. I'm sure that is for PC players, but it's annoyingly bunched up for a console controller.
Reviewers.review_title: Fine For The Price & Works With Xbox X Series

Reviewers.review_body: It is a good pair of headphones for the buck.  But the sound quality could be better.  I occasionally hear a slight echo.  The cups on the ears are not as big as I expected.  So, if you want something that will fit over the ears this is not the set for you.  But otherwise, they are comfortable.  The noise cancellation is excellent.  The look is sleek, and I like it.  The headphones are easy to setup but be sure to plug in the adapter if you are using it with PC.

The sturdiness of this headset is amazing.  I can get frustrated with games and toss them aside (or worse) and they keep on trucking.  There is a small piece inside the right side that has come off that can rattle around, but only when you shake it do you hear it.  Can be used to listen to music but the sound quality is only ok at best.  I'm not an audiophile but there is a big difference between a set of these and a $150 turtle beach set.  As far as comfort, the ear pieces don't go over my entire ear, but rather sit on it.  Normally this would be a problem but the headset allows you to bend it slightly so they don't squeeze.  Or if they are too loose you can bend them in to get them tighter.  If all you want is a reasonably comfortable headset for gaming and the the occasional music, these are great for the price point.

It is so good that even Shazam can recognize the song you want by just putting your phone next to the ear headphone. It is very comfortable and does not fit tight like other gaming headset I have had. I love the color blue on it and the mic works very well. Definitely worth the buy and will be buying another set for my partner.

Awesome sound quality and feels great. Only downside is that it’s not adjustable if you want the mic on the right side (at least that’s how mine came). The mic can go up and down, but not further away or closer to your face, so that was a big bummer a reason for 4 stars. Still recommend.

The microphone sounds ok, but the headset is definitely surround sound, however the sound coming from the head phone sounds a bit muffled. But the quality of the mic is a lot better than I thought it would be. So recommend this headset if u are looking for something fancy looking and cheap and that has Decent quality at the time

Bought this product as an early Christmas gift to allow a friend to be on discord with us. Friend states the coloring is nice and is good for gaming. The sound quality on our end is alright. It isn't crystal clear but is definitely more acceptable than his laptop microphone. Recommend for the price.
Reviewers.review_title: Great gift, quality is okay for price

Reviewers.review_body: Only down side is that after some time the wires got tangled up and its hard to untangle. I switched to a wireless which is much better

I use it mostly for gaming. Sound is great quality. Just doesn’t have as good noise cancellation of more expensive headphones, but the sound and price make up for this. Plus at a high volume I can’t hear anything else anyways.

I picked these up for $18 usd. At that price they are great; however, their normal retail price of ~$45 is... go buy something else. It would be more wise to wait for one of the higher end headsets to go on sale and splurge for that. I didn't even want these, but a friend wouldn't stop harassing me and wait for me to shop around and wait for a sale.
Reviewers.review_title: You get what you pay for.
